reviews.text: Muy buena comida buen servicio lo recomiendo
Muy buen sabor de la comida, ambiente agradable
Good down to earth food.not expensive..Food is what mexican eats in mexico or very very expensive mexican restaurants in manhattan .humble friendly warm.try CHILES RELLENOS.a delicacy.
Amazing service, tacos were okay, pretty big tacos but flavors weren't to my taste

Woman at register was new and didn't understand the prices, or what I was ordering, ended up trying to charge me twice for one order. Left beyond annoyed,she didn't even give me my change from the first order

Service is good, place is clean. But that's the complements. Food is always first cause that's why I came for. Tacos are too small, almost empty and the flavors aren't good for my taste. I know what. Good taco taste like. The meat and the sauce are missing on flavors. They seemed to be fresh tho.
Best Tacos and affordable
Great tacos and cemitas! Lovely  place. A bit small and sometimes crowded, but worth the time and wait.

I discovered this little taqueria from heaven when I ended up in the neighborhood, was starving, and it just happened to be the first thing in my view.  I was really just looking to fill my stomach.  I wasn't expending that I would stumble‚Ä¶
Good food. But the deliver sucks if you are 4 blocks from there. They wont deliver

A surprising find in the heart if the south Bronx but the food here is amazing try the Mexican salad burrito or there tacos all freshly made all the time
